channel.title: [PI] How do I make a zone that doesn't make you lose items? [HELP]
channel.description:
Hey I made a fun pk zone and when I die it makes me lose items. How can I make it so it doesn't make people lose items?
thanks

item.title: [PI] How do I make a zone that doesn't make you lose items? [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

toggle out the applyDead() part that causes you to lose items. (ONLY FOR YOUR AREA!)

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How do I make a zone that doesn't make you lose items? [HELP]
